body_content.explanation: the act of protecting or state of being protected:
examples: Their flimsy tent gave/offered little protection against the severe storm.
Round-the-clock police protection is given to all senior politicians.
New legislation still does not offer adequate protection for many endangered species.
Always wear goggles as a protection for your eyes when using the machines.
The insurance policy provides protection (= will make a financial payment) in case of accidental loss of life or serious injury.

body_content.explanation: a method of preventing pregnancy or the spread of sexual disease that works by physically blocking substances such as sperm from coming into contact with the body :
examples: If you have an IUD, you still need to use some form of protection like condoms or dental dams to reduce the risk of sexually transmitted infections.
